body: Yeah. It can be fixed in `replace`, but something in rollup@0.25.2 broke this.

Just add `&& node.consequent.type !== 'ConditionalExpression'`in https://github.com/rollup/rollup/commit/1a0011485e912295df28bea534fd69abc823b701#diff-5c98da346b849e07de8c1173579789b0R313 to skip optimization?
this just happened to me. same thing but without a conditional. I'll work it down to a minimal test case and get back to you.

issue.title: Prune dead conditional expressions more carefully.

body: I verified that the example provided by @TrySound now works with #567 applied. If that looks good to everybody I'll merge and do a release.
